snippet.title: Koira - Official Trailer | Day of the Devs 2024
snippet.description:
Koira is a 2D adventure game that tells a tale of friendship and explores what we’re willing to do to defend it. Developed by Studio Tolima and published by DON’T NOD, Koira is set in a magical forest, challenging players to befriend and protect a puppy on a journey that sees you meeting woodland creatures, solving puzzles, and trying to find your way home.

Koira is coming to PC via Steam in 2025. The Koira demo will be available to play in Summer 2024.
